Article Title: India match schedule for T20 World Cup: All India upcoming matches, timings, venues
Article Text:
PTI Photo

Special dinner for Team India at Gautam Gambhir‚Äôs house in Delhi | T20 World Cup

Match Team vs Team Result Venue Date Match 1 India vs USA India won by 29 runs Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai Sat, Feb 7, 2026 Match 2 India vs Namibia Yet to be played Arun Jaitley Stadium, Delhi Thu, Feb 12, 2026 Match 3 India vs Pakistan Yet to be played R. Premadasa Stadium, Colombo Sun, Feb 15, 2026 Match 4 India vs Netherlands Yet to be played Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad Wed, Feb 18, 2026

Team India, under the leadership of Suryakumar Yadav , began their T20 World Cup 2026 campaign on a winning note, defeating the United States of America by 29 runs at the Wankhede Stadium on Saturday.The Men in Blue will next face Namibia on Thursday at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi. That will be followed by a marquee showdown against arch-rivals Pakistan on Sunday, February 15. The much-anticipated clash is set to take place at the R. Premadasa Stadium in Colombo and is expected to be one of the highlights of the group stage.India will wrap up their Group A fixtures with a match against the Netherlands on February 18 at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad.As defending champions, India enter the tournament with a chance to achieve something truly special. In a format where supremacy is often short-lived and margins razor-thin, the team has an opportunity to defend a men‚Äôs T20 World Cup title ‚Äî an achievement that would further strengthen their legacy in the shortest format. India are also aiming to become the first nation to lift the T20 World Cup trophy on home soil.A successful campaign would also make India the first team to win the men‚Äôs T20 World Cup three times.India‚Äôs journey in the tournament began with glory in the inaugural edition in 2007, when they defeated Pakistan in the final at the New Wanderers Stadium in Johannesburg under the captaincy of Mahendra Singh Dhoni. That iconic triumph laid the foundation for India‚Äôs dominance in T20 cricket.The second title, however, came after a long wait. Seventeen years later, India returned to the summit in 2024, with Rohit Sharma leading the side to a memorable title win. India edged past South Africa in a thrilling final to finally end their prolonged title drought.Now, with momentum on their side, India will look to script another historic chapter in T20 World Cup history.
Article Summary: India begin their t20 world cup 2026 campaign against usa on saturday. The men in blue will next face namibia on thursday at the arun jaitley stadium in delhi. That will be followed by a marquee showdown against arch-rivals pakistan on february 15.

The Super 8 stage of the ICC T20 World Cup is completely set now, with eight teams confirming qualification for the next round.From Group A, India advanced in dominant fashion, winning all four of their matches. Pakistan became the last team to qualify after a 102-run win over Namibia, powered by Sahibzada Farhan‚Äôs unbeaten century and Usman Tariq‚Äôs four-wicket spell, sealing their place in the Super 8 stage.Group B saw Sri Lanka and Zimbabwe progress after Zimbabwe‚Äôs league game against Ireland was washed out in Kandy. The shared points eliminated the 2021 champions Australia, who cannot catch Zimbabwe on the table.From Group C, England and West Indies qualified, while Group D representatives are New Zealand and South Africa.The top two teams from each Super 8 group will advance to the semi-finals, setting up the final sprint towards the T20 World Cup 2026 title. India are the defending champions of the T20 World Cup.
Article Summary: The super 8 stage of the icc t20 world cup is completely set now. India advanced in dominant fashion, winning all four of their matches. Pakistan became the last team to qualify after a 102-run win over namibia. Sri lanka and zimbabwe progress after zimbabwe‚Äôs league game against ireland was washed out in kandy.

Article Title: Babar Azam Meme: 'Hum dispresan mein hain': Memes storm internet after Babar Azam demoted against Namibia
Article Text:
Pakistan's Babar Azam during a practice session ahead of an ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2026 cricket match between India and Pakistan, at R Premadasa Stadium, in Colombo, Sri Lanka. (PTI Photo)

Pakistan batter Babar Azam drew fresh online criticism during his team‚Äôs Group A match against Namibia national cricket team at the ICC Men‚Äôs T20 World Cup 2026 in Colombo after he did not get a chance to bat.The experienced batter, long seen as one of Pakistan‚Äôs leading run-scorers, has struggled for form in the competition. On X and other platforms, fans have questioned why he has not made an impact, even when opportunities might have arisen earlier in the tournament.The 31-year-old had originally been picked as a fail-safe option. He was expected to anchor the innings at number four and steady the side if wickets fell, an area where Pakistan have faced problems in the past.However, against the Netherlands and India, he did not play that role effectively when Pakistan's batting collapsed. In the must-win game against Namibia, Pakistan made a strong start, and team management ‚Äî including coach Mike Hesson and captain Salman Ali Agha ‚Äî chose to send more aggressive batters ahead of him.Pakistan lost their second wicket, that of skipper Agha, in the 13th over. Instead of sending Babar at number four, Khawaja Nafay was promoted.Even after Nafay managed only 5 off 5 balls, Babar was still not sent in. Shadab Khan joined Sahibzada Farhan in the middle instead.Online reaction was swift, with users posting memes, questions and criticism about his lack of runs and Pakistan‚Äôs batting approach."Babar Azam ko team puri krny ke liay khilaya gaya hai?" asked one viewer.Another user edited a well-known ‚Äúdepression mein hain‚Äù video using Babar‚Äôs voice after his demotion.A third user wrote on X, "I think babar azam is promoted as finisher."In the match, Pakistan rode on Sahibzada Farhan's scintillating, maiden hundred and their spinners' excellent display to beat Namibia by a handsome margin of 102 runs and enter the Super Eights of the T20 World Cup on Wednesday.
Article Summary: Pakistan batter babar azam drew fresh online criticism during his team‚Äôs group a match against namibia national cricket team. The experienced batter, long seen as one of pakistan's leading run-scorers, has struggled for form in the competition.

Article Title: Chris Hemsworth hints at stepping into MMA one day as Avengers star reveals his favorite UFC names
Article Text:
Chris Hemsworth (Image Via Getty)

Chris Hemsworth names Georges St-Pierre and Alexander Volkanovski as favorite UFC stars while joking about his dream MMA fight

Chris Hemsworth is known around the world for playing Thor, but away from movies, the Australian actor has another passion, mixed martial arts. In a recent conversation with Academy Award winner Halle Berry during a Complex video segment, Hemsworth openly talked about how long he has trained and how much he respects MMA. He said he has spent years sparring and learning, even though he understands how difficult real fighting can be.The actor surprised fans when he admitted that he would love to step into a real MMA fight someday. While speaking honestly, he also joked about how things might go for him inside the cage. The discussion quickly turned into a fun chat about favourite UFC fighters, showing how deeply both actors follow the sport and respect the athletes who compete at the highest level.During the conversation, Chris Hemsworth was asked who his ideal MMA opponent would be. Instead of giving a serious answer, he joked and said it would be someone who retired long ago so he could run around until they got tired.Still, he made it clear that he genuinely respects the sport and has trained for years.He explained, ‚ÄúI‚Äôve trained a lot and sparred a lot of years but within the realm of not killing each other. Love to just one day go ‚Äòright, what have I done here?,‚Äô I‚Äôd probably end up flat on my back, starry eyes.‚ÄùHemsworth also shared the fighters he admires most.He mentioned former UFC champion Georges St-Pierre, praising his intelligence and gentleman-like personality. He also named Alexander Volkanovski, calling the Australian champion a friend and someone he respects deeply in the sport.Halle Berry, who starred in the MMA-themed film Bruised, also joined the discussion by naming Anderson Silva, Sean O‚ÄôMalley, and Valentina Shevchenko as her favourites.Her film earned praise from UFC president Dana White and featured Shevchenko in a role, which helped connect Hollywood and MMA even more. Hemsworth has shown his interest in combat sports before.He attended UFC 243, where Israel Adesanya defeated Robert Whittaker in the main event. Around the same period, while promoting Thor: Ragnarok, Hemsworth humorously claimed that the fight between Thor and Hulk was bigger than the famous Conor McGregor vs. Floyd Mayweather Jr. boxing event, showing his playful side toward combat sports hype.
Article Summary: Chris hemsworth is known around the world for playing thor, but away from movies, the australian actor has another passion, mixed martial arts. In a recent conversation with academy award winner halle berry during a complex video segment, hemsworth openly talked about how long he has trained.

Article Title: NBA injury report: What happened to Kyrie Irving? Dallas Mavericks player ruled out for season as he focuses on strong ACL recovery
Article Text:
Kyrie Irving shares ACL update (Image via NBA)

Kyrie Irving shares emotional message as Mavericks star confirms season-ending recovery decision

Mavericks struggle without Kyrie Irving as Dallas shifts focus toward rebuilding phase

As he continues to recuperate from knee surgery in March, Kyrie Irving, a standout for the Dallas Mavericks, will miss the rest of the season, his agent informed ESPN's Shams Charania. Irving hasn't played this season since undergoing surgery in March to repair a ruptured left ACL. Anticipated to return for the 2026‚Äì2027 season is the nine-time All-Star.Considering that the Mavs are in full tank mode, it is hardly a major surprise. However, the 33-year-old will not play this season as he continues to recover from the ACL tear he sustained in March, according to a press release from the organization.Officially, Kyrie Irving will miss the season. Shetellia Riley Irving, his agent, informed Charania:"This is about Kyrie being 1,000% when he comes back and giving himself the best chance to chase a championship next season,"Irving said in that release:‚ÄúThis decision wasn‚Äôt easy, but it‚Äôs the right one.. I am grateful for the Mavericks organization, my teammates and our fans for their continued support throughout the process. I am looking forward to coming back stronger next season. The belief and drive I have inside only grows‚Ä¶‚ÄùHe continued:‚ÄúAnd I wanted to send a huge shoutout to ALL of my brothers and sisters out there who‚Äôve torn their ACL or gotten injured doing what they love to do every day. THANK YOU for the inspiration. No fear!‚ÄùFor the rest of the season, Irving will continue his recuperation under the guidance of the Mavericks' performance and medical staff.Irving and the team reached a three-year, $119 million contract in June 2025 while he continues to recuperate. For the rest of this season, he will continue in rehab under the care of the Mavs' performance and medical staff.However, he has already missed the last 20 games of the previous campaign due to a knee injury. Since the 15-year veteran joined the team in the 2022‚Äì2023 season, the Mavericks are 75‚Äì53 when Irving is in the lineup. On the other hand, they are only 42-75 when Irving is not present.The Mavericks have a 19-35 record going into the post-All-Star break stretch of their schedule, which puts them fourth in the Southwest Division. Dallas announced its plan to rebuild earlier this month with the trade of Anthony Davis, who was sold to the Washington Wizards in a nine-player blockbuster.
Article Summary: Kyrie irving will miss the rest of the season, his agent informed espn's shams charania. Irving hasn't played this season since undergoing surgery in march to repair a ruptured left acl. Anticipated to return for the 2026‚Äì2027 season is the nine-time all-star.

NEW DELHI: Australia‚Äôs T20 World Cup campaign came to an abrupt end on Tuesday after rain washed out Zimbabwe‚Äôs Group B fixture against Ireland in Pallekele without a single ball being bowled.The abandonment proved decisive, as the shared points carried Zimbabwe into the second stage of the tournament for the first time, while the 2021 champions were eliminated.Eight teams have now sealed their spots in the next round. Zimbabwe slot into Group 1 alongside defending champions India, West Indies and South Africa. Group 2 features Sri Lanka, England, New Zealand, and Pakistan.Pakistan faced Namibia on Wednesday in a must-win clash to keep their Super 8 hopes alive. Namibia were already out of the race, but Pakistan could afford a defeat.As it turned out, Pakistan defeated Namibia by 102 runs and comfortably qualified for the Super 8s
Article Summary: Eight teams have now sealed their spots in the next round. Zimbabwe slot into group 1 alongside defending champions india, west indies and south africa. Group 2 features sri lanka, england, new zealand, and pakistan. Pakistan defeated namibia by 102 runs and comfortably qualified for the super 8s.

Article Title: Doug Moe‚Äôs net worth: Total career earnings, ABA stint, and more
Article Text:
Doug Moe (David Zalubowski/AP Photo )

Doug Moe‚Äôs financial standing and career earnings

Doug Moe‚Äôs career and statistical milestones

The basketball world is mourning the loss of legendary player and coach Doug Moe. After a long battle with cancer, Moe passed away on February 17, 2026, at the age of 87 in San Antonio.From a 117-135 record with Spurs over 4 seasons(1976-1980) to a decade-long tenure with Nuggets (1980‚Äì1990), Moe was known for his high speed passing game offense, and ‚Äúdo whatever the hell you want" mindset over rigid set plays. He led the Nuggets to nine consecutive playoff appearances (1981-1990) and set a franchise record of 432 regular-season wins, and also earned the 1988 NBA Coach of the Year award and the prestigious Chuck Daly Lifetime Achievement Award in 2018.While Moe‚Äôs private net worth was never made official, his financial empire was mainly built on decades of coaching contracts and as a premier ABA star. An iconic moment of his coaching career that encapsulated Moe‚Äôs personality is the September 1990 press conference when he appeared in a Hawaiian shirt after being fired by the Nuggets. Moe and his wife, Jane, celebrated in front of the media as the Nuggets were still obligated to pay out the remaining years of his contract.Moe was signed on a 4-year extension that would have kept him in Denver through the 1992-93 season.Moe‚Äôs financial legacy is also tied to his early years in the ABA, where he was one of the league‚Äôs premier stars. His "432" banner still hangs in the rafters of Ball Arena, cementing his place as the Nuggets‚Äô winningest coach (former).Moe‚Äôs journey began as a fierce competitor in the American Basketball Association (ABA). From 1967 to 1972, he played 5 seasons and scored 6,161 career points, with an average of 16.3 points, 6.8 rebounds, and 3.2 assists per game. He shot at an efficiency of 42.8% from the floor and 80.0% from the FT line. He earned three ABA All-Star honors and helped carry the Oakland Oaks to a championship in 1969.The 1961 point-shaving scandal put a target on Moe‚Äôs back, and despite being exonerated, he was banned from playing in the NBA. But as a coach, Moe spent fifteen seasons in the NBA and recorded 628-529. During his golden years with Denver, the team led the league in scoring six times, with five being in consecutive seasons.
Article Summary: Moe was known for his high speed passing game offense, and ‚Äúdo whatever the hell you want" mindset over rigid set plays. He led the nuggets to nine consecutive playoff appearances (1981-1990) and set a franchise record of 432 regular-season wins.

Article Text:
Tilak Varma, right, and Suryakumar Yadav celebrate the wicket of Pakistan's Shadab Khan. (AP Photo)

T20 World Cup: India humiliate Pakistan again

GROUP A P W L NR PTS NRR India (Q) 4 4 0 0 8 +2.500 Pakistan (Q) 4 3 1 0 6 +0.976 USA (E) 4 2 2 0 4 +0.787 Netherlands (E) 4 1 3 0 2 -1.217 Namibia (E) 4 0 4 0 0 -3.108

GROUP B P W L NR PTS NRR Sri Lanka (Q) 3 3 0 0 6 +2.462 Zimbabwe (Q) 3 2 0 1 5 +1.984 Ireland (E) 4 1 2 1 3 +0.150 Australia (E) 3 1 2 0 2 +0.414 Oman (E) 3 0 3 0 0 -4.546

GROUP C P W L NR PTS NRR West Indies (Q) 3 3 0 0 6 +1.820 England (Q) 4 3 1 0 6 +0.201 Scotland (E) 4 1 3 0 2 +0.184 Italy (E) 3 1 2 0 2 -0.588 Nepal (E) 4 1 3 0 2 -1.349

GROUP D P W L NR PTS NRR South Africa (Q) 4 4 0 0 8 +1.943 New Zealand (Q) 4 3 1 0 6 +1.227 Afghanistan (E) 3 1 2 0 2 -0.215 UAE (E) 4 1 3 0 2 -1.364 Canada (E) 3 0 3 0 0 -1.865

NEW DELHI: The ongoing ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2026 is at the fag end of the group stage matches. Till Wednesday (February 18), 36 out of 40 group stage matches had been completed in the tournament, co-hosted by India and Sri Lanka. The race for Super Eights spots is over now - with all slots filled.Teams who have booked their tickets to the next stage are: defending champions India, co-hosts Sri Lanka, the West Indies, England, South Africa, New Zealand, Zimbabwe and Pakistan.Remaining 12 of the 20 competing teams have been officially eliminated from the Super 8s race.So, all the four groups have a complete picture of who has qualified and been eliminated.Group C was the first to have a clear picture, the Windies and England qualified for the Super 8s, and the remaining three teams in the group ‚Äî Scotland (late replacement for Bangladesh), debutants Italy and Nepal ‚Äî were eliminated.Then followed the Group D, New Zealand became the second team to book their spot in the Super 8s after beating Canada in their final group game. The Kiwis joined South Africa in the next round from the group.Afghanistan, UAE and Canada are now eliminated from the race.On Tuesday, Group B's picture also became clear as Zimbabwe joined Sri Lanka to the next stage from the group, forcing former champions Australia to exit the tournament early. Ireland and Oman are the other two teams to be eliminated from the group.And on Wednesday, Group A has their second team qualified for the Super 8s. Unbeaten India topped the group and marched for the next round with 4-0 record. Pakistan joined India after their victory over Namibia. USA and Netherlands are the other two teams eliminated from the group.After rain abandoned the Zimbabwe-Ireland match on Tuesday, Group B's Super 8s teams were also finalised. Zimbabwe, with 5 points, joined co-hosts Sri Lanka in the next round. Australia were eliminated before their final group game.Group C is sorted, with West Indies and England already through to the next round.Like C, Group D is also sorted now. New Zealand joined the last edition‚Äôs finalists South Africa in the Super 8s from the group.
Article Summary: The race for super eights spots is over now - with all slots filled. Defending champions india, co-hosts sri lanka, the west indies, england, south africa, new zealand, zimbabwe and pakistan are through. Remaining 12 of the 20 competing teams have been officially eliminated.

Article Title: Mikaela Shiffrin‚Äôs fianc√© shares emotional reaction after her Winter Olympics gold win
Article Text:
Mikaela Shiffrin (Image Via Getty)

Mikaela Shiffrin and Aleksander Aamodt Kilde show strong support after emotional Olympic gold

Mikaela Shiffrin finally got the moment she had been chasing for years. The American skier won gold in the women‚Äôs slalom at the Milan Cortina Winter Olympics on February 18, ending a long Olympic medal drought. Her victory was dominant, emotional, and historic. Soon after the race, congratulations poured in including a short but meaningful message from her Norwegian fianc√©, Aleksander Aamodt Kilde, who wrote on Instagram, ‚ÄúShe did it again.‚ÄùThe win was important because Shiffrin came into these Games with pressure and doubts after leaving Beijing 2022 without a medal. Earlier events in Milan were also disappointing, including an 11th-place giant slalom finish and a near miss in the team event. But in slalom, her strongest discipline, she delivered. Shiffrin finished with a combined time of 1:39.10, winning by 1.50 seconds over Switzerland‚Äôs Camille Rast, while Sweden‚Äôs Anna Swenn Larsson took bronze. The margin was one of the biggest seen in Olympic alpine skiing in decades.Mikaela Shiffrin‚Äôs gold also showed how much support she has around her. Kilde is missing the Olympics due to injuries following a serious crash and long recovery, but he publicly celebrated her success with pride.Team USA skier Breezy Johnson wrote, ‚ÄúSo proud of this lady!!! 2x slalom champ!!!!‚Äù while Lindsey Vonn also shared congratulations online. For Shiffrin, this was more than just a medal.This became her third Olympic gold and fourth Olympic medal overall, making her the first American alpine skier to win three Olympic golds.She also became the first U.S. skier to win Olympic slalom twice, joining Swiss legend Vreni Schneider in that rare achievement. After crossing the finish line, Shiffrin dropped down with emotion before raising her fists to the crowd.She later said, ‚ÄúToday I showed up for the skiing. I wanted to have two runs with really strong slalom skiing‚Ä¶ to also get to have a medal is unbelievable.‚ÄùThe moment felt bigger because she has openly talked about tough years, including injuries and mental struggles after past crashes.Through all of it, she and Kilde have supported each other. Their shared journey made this Olympic gold feel personal not just for the result, but for everything it took to get there.
Article Summary: Mikaela shiffrin won gold in the women‚Äôs slalom at the milan cortina winter olympics. She became the first american alpine skier to win three olympic golds. Her fianc√©, aleksander aamodt kilde, publicly celebrated her success with pride.

Article Title: Mick Cronin out of UCLA team? Fiery coach‚Äôs heated press conference sparks buzz among teammates after Michigan State loss
Article Text:
Mick Cronin is now facing criticism (Image via Getty Images)

Mick Cronin‚Äôs heated exchange and tough message grab attention after loss

Mick Cronin‚Äôs viral outburst sparks debate on discipline as UCLA struggles after back-to-back heavy defeats

Mick Cronin has long been known for his edge, accountability, and unreserved desire for toughness. That edge became something much more flammable on Tuesday night in East Lansing. His team's performance in Tuesday night's 82-59 loss to Michigan State did not satisfy him.Cronin was questioned about the chanting at Xavier Booker, a former Spartan player who transferred to UCLA, by the Michigan State student section. So, a question he got during his postgame news conference may have made him even more irate.Tuesday night, UCLA lost to No. 15 Michigan State by more than 20 points for the second time in a row. During the game, Bruins coach Mick Cronin seemed to remove one of his own players.UCLA center Steven Jamerson II, a former Michigan State student, was punished for a flagrant after fouling Carson Cooper from behind on a dunk attempt with 4:26 remaining in the Bruins' 82-59 defeat, with the team down 77-50.Michigan State supporters yelled the name of former five-star prospect Xavier Booker, a center for the Boston Bruins, during the game. After the game, Cronin got into a heated argument with a reporter who inquired about the Booker chants, saying:"I could give a rat's ass about the other team's student section. I would like to give you a kudos for the worst question I've ever been asked.. You really think I care about the other team's student section?‚ÄùCronin then accused the reporter of "raising your voice at me." Cronin said:"Yeah, you are.. Everybody is standing here listening to you.Everybody. This is on camera. They can hear you. I answered the question. I can give a rat's ass about the other team's student section."When UCLA lost against the Michigan State Spartans 82-59, the coach's fury erupted in a way that Bruins supporters hardly ever saw. With just over four minutes left, UCLA center Steven Jamerson II fouled Carson Cooper hard during a dunk attempt, causing the team to fall behind 77-50. Authorities determined a flagrant. Cronin got farther.Cronin then explained after the game:"You know, true toughness is how you compete and how you go to work every day. Steve's a good kid. He made a bad decision‚Ä¶ But if you want to be a tough guy, you need to do it during the game, for a blockout, for a rebound‚Ä¶‚ÄùHe said:"So, I was thoroughly disappointed; the guy was defenseless in the air. I know Steve was trying to block the shot, but the game's a 25-point game. You don't do that."Coach Tom Izzo of the Spartans, whose team improved to 21-5, 11-4 in the Big Ten, had never seen such a strange situation before. Izzo made a joke:"I guess he upgraded that to a flagrant 2, huh?.. That's the first time I saw a coach do it, but that sounds like Mick. So, he'll get that straightened out."Since then, the incident has gone viral, igniting a discussion on topics like player discipline, pure coaching ethics, and how to handle the growing frustrations within the Bruins team as they strive to earn a spot in the NCAA tournament.He opened himself when questioned about the chants after the game. He referred to it as the worst question he had ever received. He questioned the tone. He gave a forceful shove back. To put things in perspective, UCLA had just suffered a 30-point loss to No. 1 Michigan over the weekend.The Bruins are now 17-9 overall and 9-6 in Big Ten play after suffering yet another setback by more than 20 points, this time to a highly regarded Michigan State squad. Westwood hasn't had consecutive blowouts like this in many generations.
Article Summary: Ucla lost 82-59 to no. 15 michigan state on tuesday night. Ucla center steven jamerson ii, a former michigan state student, was punished for a flagrant after fouling carson cooper from behind on a dunk attempt. Michigan state supporters yelled the name of former five-star prospect xavier booker, a center for the boston bruins, during the game.

Article Title: Sidney Crosby injury leaves Team Canada on edge in high-stakes Olympic quarterfinal game
Article Text:
Sidney Crosby (Image Source: Getty)

Sidney Crosby exits after heavy collision, medical concerns mount

Team Canada adapts, but questions loom ahead of semifinal

Team Canada‚Äôs quest for Olympic gold at the Milano Cortina Winter Games took a bizarre and scary turn when captain Sidney Crosby had to exit a nail-biting quarter-final clash with Czechia early due to injury. The experienced forward left early in the second period following a heavy hit, sending alarm bells through the Canadian bench and fans watching in a high-pressure contest.Crosby's absence loomed large over the rest of the game with hopes of medals on the line. While Canada did eventually fight back to win in overtime, attention soon turned from the final score to the status of the team's leader and emotional pillar as the tourney reached its critical stretch.Crosby fell into the boards after getting caught between two Czech defenders while going through the neutral zone with the puck during a physical sequence. He stayed on the ice a few moments, then skated slowly to the bench and off down the tunnel under his own power. Later, team officials said he would not return due to a lower-body injury and would be re-evaluated.When he left, Canada was chasing in a game for the first time all tournament, an unusual spot for a team that is all about speed, depth, and experience at this level.Crosby had already made significant defensive and offensive contributions, playing heavy minutes and centering Canada‚Äôs top line. The unexpected absence forced head coach Jon Cooper to rearrange lines in a pinch, squeezing younger forwards into heavier minutes and responsibility roles.While that was a punch to the gut, Canada recovered, equalizing late in the game and clinching the win in overtime. Players spoke afterward about rallying around one another and feeding off the loss of their captain to spur each other on, but the reverberations of the celebrations were tempered by disbelief. Finding a replacement for Crosby, a captain who excels in the faceoff circle and has a knack for staying calm under pressure, isn‚Äôt going to happen easily, particularly with the competition heating up.With a semifinal on the horizon for Canada, the team must now wait for medical reports from trainers to help set strategy and expectations. Crosby was always going to be a big part of Canada‚Äôs gold-medal push, but his injury at least injects a bit of vulnerability, regardless of whether he returns to the lineup. With margins tightening and foes stiffening, the next few days may decide if Canada's Olympic fate rests on recovery, reinvention, or both.
Article Summary: Sidney crosby left early in the second period after a heavy hit. Team officials said he would not return due to a lower-body injury and would be re-evaluated. Crosby had already made significant defensive and offensive contributions, playing heavy minutes and centering canada's top line.

Article Title: Mitch Marner‚Äôs overtime goal leads Canada to win against Czechia for Olympic semifinal spot
Article Text:
Mitch Marner scored a dramatic win at 1:22 of 3-on-3 overtime as the country battled back from a late 3-2 deficit at the Olympics (Image Source: Getty Images)

Mitch Marner delivers an OT heroic goal as Team Canada secures Olympic semis spot

Team Canada advanced to the men's ice hockey semifinal at the 2026 Winter Olympics after a thrilling 4-3 overtime victory over Czechia in quarter-final action at the Milano Santaguilia Ice Hockey Arena on Wednesday. As per reports, it was Mitch Marner's overtime winning goal at just 1:22 into overtime that led the Canadiens to book a spot at the semifinal.As per reports, Canada trailed late in regulation, with Czechia taking a 3‚Äì2 lead less than eight minutes from the end. But Nick Suzuki delivered a clutch equalizer with 3:27 to play, forcing sudden death and giving Canada a lifeline. Now, the team will be seen playing for chasing Gold at the men‚Äôs hockey semifinals match scheduled on Friday, and the team would be decided soon.Mitch Marner‚Äôs heroic contribution has led Team Canada to secure a spot at the Olympic semifinal . The team scored a 1:22 into overtime, propelling Canada to a thrilling 4-3 comeback victory over Czechia in the Milano Cortina 2026 Olympic men's hockey quarterfinals. The top-seeded Canadians rallied from a late 3-2 deficit, advancing to Friday's semifinals despite losing captain Sidney Crosby to injury.As per reports, Mitch Marner scored a dramatic winner at 1:22 of 3-on-3 overtime to recover the team from a 3-2 deficit.According to TSN, the Vegas Golden Knights winger sliced through the Czech defence and roofed a backhand to send the Canadian contingent in Italy into a frenzy. However, the team finally picked up a 4-3 victory over Czechia in the quarterfinals on Wednesday.Apart from Mitch Marner, top players like Macklin Celebrini and Nathan MacKinnon also had significant contributions to the team. As per reports, Connor McDavid tallied two assists, tying the Olympic record with NHL players at 11 points, while, unfortunately, Crosby went into the locker room after sustaining an injury.The player was injured five minutes into the second period after his right leg bent in an awkward direction after taking a hit from Czech defenceman Radko Gudas during the match. Earlier, Crosby set the record for points by a Canadian NHLer at the Olympics in Sunday‚Äôs 10-2 victory over France.According to TSN, Canada won Olympic gold with its NHL stars in 2002, 2010, and 2014 before the league skipped the 2018 event. It is to be noted that the Czechs‚Äô only victory over Canada at an Olympics came during a semifinal shootout at the 1998 Games in Nagano, Japan, as reported by TSN. It will now be interesting to see if Canada can book a spot at the final of the Olympic Games this year.
Article Summary: Mitch marner‚Äôs heroic contribution has led team canada to secure a spot at the olympic semifinal. The team scored a 1:22 into overtime, propelling canada to a thrilling 4-3 comeback victory over czechia. The top-seeded canadians rallied from a late 3-2 deficit, advancing to friday's semifinals despite losing captain sidney crosby to injury.

Article Title: Myron Gardner contract update: How did undrafted Miami Heat swingman earn impressive three-year NBA deal after two-way rise?
Article Text:
Myron Gardner contract update (Image via NBA)

Gardner‚Äôs new Heat deal includes conditional guarantees as undrafted wing earns bigger NBA opportunity

Heat rookie Myron Gardner impresses with strong play and G League numbers as Miami plans bigger role

As Myron Gardner transitions out of his Two-Way contract, he and the Miami Heat have reached an agreement on a three-year conventional NBA contract. The Heat promoted Swingman to fill the void on their 15-man roster. Myron Gardner from his two-way contract, the organization said in a news release today.Agent Jake Cohen informs NBA source Chris Haynes that Gardner and the Heat have negotiated a three-year contract. Gardner has made 26 appearances with the Heat this season, averaging 9.8 minutes with 4.2 points, 3.0 rebounds, and 1.0 assists.Anthony Chiang of The Miami Herald claims that the contract won't be guaranteed beyond this season. The second- and third-year guarantees, according to Chiang, are "conditional," meaning Gardner must stay under contract until specific dates in order to get his full compensation for those seasons.Chris Haynes wrote:‚ÄúMiami Heat and swingman Myron Gardner have reached an agreement on a three-year deal, his agent Jake Cohen of Iconic Sports Management tells me. The undrafted rookie earns a standard deal after playing stellar on a two-way contract‚Ä¶‚ÄùGardner, a 2023 undrafted graduate of Arkansas-Little Rock, played for the G League's Osceola Magic for two seasons until agreeing to a two-year deal with Miami in July.After seeing little involvement during the first two months of the season, the wing has since been thrown into a starting role and has seen more activity since the beginning of January.Gardner had four starts in his final seven games up to the All-Star break, averaging 17.7 minutes per night with 7.0 points and 6.0 rebounds and shooting.474/.444/.714 from the field.Gardner, who had a two-way contract before, has so far made a big impression on the Heat. The rookie has averaged 4.2 points, 3.0 rebounds, and 1.0 assists in 9.2 minutes per game across 26 games, shooting 40.0 percent from outside the arc. It is anticipated that he will play a bigger part in the future.Gardner has also made 10 appearances this season with the Sioux Falls Skyforce, the HEAT's G League affiliate, and averaged 15.7 points, 9.6 rebounds, 3.2 assists, 1.50 steals, and 28.0 minutes while shooting 44.5 percent from the field, 44.9 percent from three-point range, and 86.7 percent from the foul line.Jake Cohen represents Gardner, a Little Rock native who was out of the draft in 2023. Despite having a complete 15-man roster, the Heat still have space below the luxury tax line, according to Ira Winderman of The South Florida Sun Sentinel.If they so choose, they can sign another free agent in the upcoming weeks. Terry Rozier would be the clear choice to be cut in that situation. The deadline for Miami to acquire a two-way player to cover Gardner's promotion is March 4.
Article Summary: Myron gardner and the miami heat have reached an agreement on a three-year conventional nba contract. Gardner has made 26 appearances with the heat this season, averaging 4.2 points, 3.0 rebounds, and 1.0 assists. The deadline for miami to acquire a two-way player to cover gardner's promotion is march 4.

Article Title: Stephen Curry gushes over a heartwarming moment of fatherhood as Ayesha Curry faces scrutiny over resurfaced remarks
Article Text:
Stephen Curry gushes over a heartwarming moment of fatherhood as Ayesha Curry faces scrutiny over resurfaced remarks.(Image via Getty Images)

Stephen Curry shares how his four children feel about his career as his wife, Ayesha Curry, continues to get trolled



Ayesha Curry continues to get trolled as Stephen Curry stands by her side



Stephen Curry, the Golden State Warriors‚Äô star player, has always been a committed father to his four children, Riley, 13, Ryan, 10, Canon, 7 and 21-month-old Caius, whom he shares with his wife, Ayesha Curry. The two have been together for close to two decades and seem pretty content with each other.While Stephen Curry is a beast on the court, he has always been a present father. Recently, the NBA legend opened up about how curious his four children have been about his career.A few hours ago, the Golden State Warriors‚Äô star player, Stephen Curry, spoke to PEOPLE as he said, ‚ÄúIt used to be that whenever I was in a jersey, they would call me Stephen, and when I wasn‚Äôt in a jersey, I was daddy‚Ä¶‚ÄùThe NBA legend added, ‚ÄúThey ask a lot more questions. They know your schedule: ‚ÄòHow many games is it?‚Äô or ‚ÄòWho are you playing?'‚ÄùStephen Curry continued, ‚ÄúI love being able to share that part of my life with them.‚ÄùWhile Stephen Curry has always been pretty committed to his wife and children, the star player has often been trolled for it. Many fans have often commented on how he ‚Äúdeserves‚Äù better than his wife, Ayesha Curry.A few days ago, to celebrate Valentine‚Äôs Day, Stephn Curry posted a few pictures with his wife, Ayesha Curry, on his social media account.While Stephen Curry made a pretty heartfelt tribute to his wife, Ayesha Curry, it sparked outrage among fans.Many shamed the popular entrepreneur as fans dragged in Ayesha Curry‚Äôs previous controversial remarks about her marriage to the NBA legend, Stephen Curry.Despite the mess, Stephen Curry has always been a strong source of strength and support to his wife, Ayesha Curry.The NBA legend, Stephen Curry, has also always praised his wife in public as he has been public about how she has been there for him through all the dark days in his career.However, Ayesha Curry continues to remain silent about all the trolling as Stephen Curry has also stayed away from standing up for her in public.
Article Summary: Stephen curry gushes over a heartwarming moment of fatherhood as ayesha curry faces scrutiny over resurfaced remarks. Stephen curry has always been a committed father to his four children, riley, 13, ryan, 10, canon, 7 and 21-month-old caius. Many fans have often commented on how he ‚Äúdeserves‚Äù better than his wife, ayesha curry.

Article Title: Slovakia shows resilience in quarterfinal victory over Germany at the Winter Olympic Games 2026
Article Text:
Slovakia players celebrate after their teammate Slovakia's Dalibor Dvorsky scores his side's third goal during a preliminary round match of men's ice hockey (Image via AP Photo/Petr David Josek)

How Team Slovakia showed resilience in the quarterfinals over Germany at the Winter Olympic Games 2026

What a match!! ü§© Team Slovakia win 6-2 against Germany in the #IceHockey men's quarter-finals!

Team Slovakia has shown its determination and grit, as it defeated Germany 6-2 in the quarterfinals of the men's hockey tournament at the 2026 Milano Cortina Olympics, advancing to the semifinals, which is scheduled to be held on Friday. Despite a scary injury to star forward Juraj Slafkovsky in the second period, the team rallied with two quick goals to secure the win at Santagiulia Arena.As per reports, the team scored two goals in 33 seconds and cruised to a 6-2 victory to become the No. 3 seed in the semifinals against an opponent that is yet to be determined. The team is eyeing to secure a position at the semi-finals and the finals of the men‚Äôs hockey tournament at the Winter Olympic Games. With this achievement, Team Slovakia will now face its opponent on February 20, determined by the remaining quarterfinal results.As Slovakia advanced to the men‚Äôs ice hockey semifinals at the 2026 Winter Olympic Games with a commanding 6‚Äì2 victory over Germany in the quarterfinals at the Santagiulia Arena on Wednesday, the team has demonstrated extreme courage, backed by a solid spirit of confidence and determination. Despite Juraj Slafkovsky‚Äôs injury during the second period of the quarterfinal game, the team managed to secure its victory.According to NHL.com, the Slovaks were holding a one-goal lead; unfortunately, the team's main star player crashed awkwardly into the boards after a collision with German defenseman Fabio Wagner. Following the incident, Slafkovsky gathered himself and retreated to the bench, with the trainer providing him an ice pack on his neck.Speaking about Slafkovsky‚Äôs injury, Slovakia‚Äôs captain, Tomas Tatar, stated, "We continued. We scored the goal. That spirit [shows]. It's great. We wanted to stay concentrated. We didn't want to get shaken up by hits. We wanted to be focused, and I think we were."The player did not stop himself from celebrating the win. Slafkovsky, who was seen with an ice pack still on his neck, jumped in excitement despite the injury. "It was a great feeling. That ice pack felt so good, and then we got two goals. I will try to do it again, but I won't try to hit my head, but I'll try the ice pack," Slafkovsky stated.Moreover, sharing his view about the win, Slovakia coach Vladimir Orszagh said, "Our team is not about a couple of top guys. Our team is about 22 guys, 25 guys. They stick together in practice and on the ice. Every day, somebody else is a hero. To me, all the guys are heroes; doesn't matter if you play one minute or 20 minutes, everyone chips in."He further added, "We are a band of brothers who work for the team, work for each other, and are living our dream. We are still living. We are in the top four." As the No. 3 seed, Slovakia could face the United States, Finland, Sweden, or Czechia, depending on the winners of the US vs. Sweden and Canada vs. Czechia. If top seeds advance, Slovakia may meet Team USA, while Canada will probably play Finland.
Article Summary: Team slovakia defeated germany 6-2 in the quarterfinals of the men's hockey tournament at the 2026 milano cortina olympics. Despite a scary injury to star forward juraj slafkovsky in the second period, the team rallied with two quick goals to secure the win. As the no.

Article Title: Larry Wheels slaps Deen the Great after he flirts with wife Sheyla Wheels on Quinton ‚ÄúRampage‚Äù Jackson‚Äôs double-date livestream
Article Text:
Larry Wheels slaps Deen the Great after he flirts with wife Sheyla Wheels on Quinton ‚ÄúRampage‚Äù Jackson‚Äôs double-date livestream (via Quinton ‚ÄúRampage‚Äù Jackson‚Äôs double-date livestream)

Live stream confrontation turns physical between Larry Wheels and Deen the Great



The ‚ÄúFAFO‚Äù trend actions, bringing quick consequences, played out live on camera this week. Boxer Deen the Great, whose real name is Nurideen Shahid Shabazz, was involved in an awkward confrontation during Quinton ‚ÄúRampage‚Äù Jackson‚Äôs double-date livestream. What began as a relaxed and friendly stream quickly turned tense after Deen the Great approached powerlifter and influencer Larry Wheels and his wife, Sheyla Wheels. He then started to behave in a manner which many viewers found disrespectful.Viewers active on the live stream said Shabazz appeared intoxicated and repeatedly ignored warnings. He openly tried to flirt with Sheyla while Larry Wheels stood beside her. The moment shocked viewers, and even Quinton ‚ÄúRampage‚Äù Jackson stepped in to calm things down. However, the situation escalated when the 25-year-old kept pushing boundaries. Eventually, Wheels lost his patience and physically intervened, creating a viral moment. The moment is now spreading rapidly across combat sports and social media platforms.According to viewers, Nurideen Shahid Shabazz approached Sheyla Wheels and asked if he could hug her in front of her husband.Wheels immediately blocked him and made it clear that he needed to respect boundaries. Quinton ‚ÄúRampage‚Äù Jackson also warned him not to insult or disrespect Wheels. Jackson even joked briefly by pretending to hug Sheyla himself, then apologized, hoping to defuse the tension.But Shabazz continued arguing. He complained that Wheels had spun him around and said he would not show respect. He also claimed the woman was fair game, which made the situation worse. When he moved closer again and attempted to touch her, Larry Wheels finally reacted. The powerlifter struck Shabazz across the face with a sharp slap that pushed him out of the camera frame. Afterwards, Wheels said he had been waiting for the moment, while Jackson laughed and told the boxer to leave.This was not Shabazz‚Äôs first controversy. At a December Misfits Boxing press event before his fight with Amado Vargas, he insulted Vargas‚Äô mother from the stage, telling her to stay out of the situation and go back to the kitchen. The comments caused backlash. Months later, Vargas defeated him by unanimous decision, handing Shabazz his first career loss. Since then, he has not fought again.
Article Summary: Larry wheels slaps deen the great after he flirts with wife sheyla wheels on quinton ‚Äúrampage‚Äù jackson‚Äôs double-date livestream. The powerlifter struck shabazz across the face with a sharp slap that pushed him out of the camera frame.

Article Title: Toronto Maple Leafs recall promising defenseman William Villeneuve amid Olympic break
Article Text:
Defenseman William Villeneuve (76) during NHL training camp in Toronto (Image via Sammy Kogan/The Canadian Press via AP)





Toronto Maple Leafs recall defenseman William Villeneuve during the Winter Olympics 2026

William Villeneuve | Practice | January 30, 2026

The Toronto Maple Leafs have recently recalled a promising defenseman, William Villeneuve, from the AHL's Toronto Marlies, providing him a key opportunity to be a part of the club in the NHL, amid the Winter Olympics break. As reported by the club, Villeneuve was called up by the Maple Leafs on Wednesday.This opportunity came for Villeneuve as the Toronto Maple Leafs have taken on players taking part in the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milan. As per reports, amidst this Olympic break, the NHL squad has returned to practice this week. It is to be noted that Villeneuve is a fourth-round pick in the 2020 NHL Draft.As per reports, he has spent four professional seasons with the Marlies, amassing 12 goals and 96 assists in 203 AHL games. Last season, he broke out with 40 points (4 goals, 36 assists) in 55 games, leading the team's defense in scoring and posting a +17 rating.To strengthen the team‚Äôs defense line, the Toronto Maple Leafs have recently announced that they‚Äôve recalled defenseman William Villeneuve from the AHL's Toronto Marlies during the ongoing Olympic Games. The decision was made to add an extra defenseman at the practices for the time being while they await Oliver Ekman-Larsson‚Äòs return, who is currently representing Sweden at the Olympics.Though Villeneuve has prior experience in the AHL, the 23-year-old player doesn't have any NHL experience yet. As per reports, Villeneuve played 55 games last season for the Marlies and recorded 36 assists. In addition to this, he has also recorded four goals and 40 points in 55 games during the 2024-25 campaign, before registering two assists in two playoff games.In this season, he has scored around 18 points through 40 games, and also has recorded 3 goals and 15 assists with the Marlies, despite the team's struggles. It is to be noted that the 23-year-old is also ranked as Toronto's second-best defensive prospect, as claimed by Terry Koshan of the Toronto Sun. But, his puck-moving skills address a need on the Leafs' blue line beyond Ekman-Larsson and Morgan Rielly.Reports suggest that for now, William Villeneuve will be only allowed to take part in the Leafs practices while the roster is short-staffed, marking his first promotion this year. As Toronto is facing challenges and a potential trade deadline shuffle, signs show that Villeneuve could make an NHL debut soon, boosting his path to the big club.
Article Summary: The toronto maple leafs have recalled william villeneuve from the ahl's toronto marlies. The 23-year-old is a fourth-round pick in the 2020 nhl draft. Last season, he broke out with 40 points (4 goals, 36 assists) in 55 games, leading the team's defense in scoring and posting a +17 rating.

Article Title: Huge blow! Matheesha Pathirana ruled out of T20 World Cup, IPL 2026 in doubt
Article Text:
Sri Lanka's Matheesha Pathirana (AP/PTI)

All about Abhishek Sharma‚Äôs lonely net session in Ahmedabad

Sri Lanka have been forced into a change in their squad for the ICC Men's T20 World Cup after fast bowler Matheesha Pathirana was ruled out with injury. Pacer Dilshan Madushanka has been officially cleared as his replacement.Pathirana picked up a muscle strain during Sri Lanka‚Äôs Group B clash against Australia national cricket team on Monday in Pallekele, a match the hosts won by eight wickets. The setback occurred early in his spell, cutting short his involvement in the game.Confirming the change, ‚ÄúThe Event Technical Committee of the ICC Men‚Äôs T20 World Cup 2026 has approved Dilshan Madushanka as a replacement for Matheesha Pathirana in the Sri Lanka squad,"the ICC said in a release.The right-arm quick had bowled just three deliveries against Australia before discomfort forced him to stop. He was unable to complete the over, having previously featured in Sri Lanka‚Äôs matches against Ireland and Oman.The injury is also a concern for his Indian Premier League franchise, Kolkata Knight Riders. The three-time champions invested INR 18 crore in Pathirana. With Mustafizur Rahman already released and Harshit Rana facing uncertainty for IPL 2026, the latest setback compounds their pace-bowling worries.The incident unfolded when he delivered a ball to Australia captain Mitchell Marsh and immediately clutched his left leg in visible pain. Although early commentary suggested a hamstring issue, it was later confirmed as a muscle strain. The team physio rushed out, but Pathirana had to be assisted off the field, with Dasun Shanaka completing the remaining deliveries of the over.
Article Summary: Matheesha pathirana ruled out of icc men's t20 world cup with muscle strain. Pacer dilshan madushanka has been officially cleared as his replacement. Sri lanka beat australia by eight wickets in pallekele on monday.
